meanings.sent1: She preferred a cashless payment method.
meanings.sent2: The store only accepted cashless transactions.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his wallet was feeling cashless after shopping.
meanings.sent4: The idea of a cashless society seemed like a distant dream.
meanings.sent5: The cashless concept made budgeting easier for her.

meanings.definition: Using electronic forms of payment instead of cash.
meanings.sent1: Their business embraced a cashless approach for convenience.
meanings.sent2: Many people find it more convenient to go cashless.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally knocked over the cashless payment device.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a cashless register, only processing digital transactions.
meanings.sent5: The future of finance looked increasingly cashless.
